title: Industrial and Engineering Chemistry
aka: Industrial and Engineering Chemistry, Industrial Edition

preceded-by.note: Journal of Industrial and Engineering Chemistry

see-also.note: Industrial and Engineering Chemistry, Analytical Edition

additional-notes: A News Edition began in 1923, which eventually changed its name to Chemical and Engineering News.  See that title for renewals of that periodical.
The Analytical Edition was spun off in 1929.  For some time after that, the main journal was sometimes referred to as the Industrial Edition.
